greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = smallest m such that A031131(m) = 2*n.
comment: a(n)-th and (a(n)+2)-nd primes are the first pair that differ by 2*n;
conjecture: sequence is defined for all n > 1.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 2..100
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 23 2015
